HomePage.1stP: Your reliable electronics repair service in Germany
HomePage.2ndP: We are a Ukrainian service center operating in Germany and specializing in the repair of smartphones, laptops, tablets, PCs, consoles and other electronics
HomePage.3rdP: Professional equipment, many years of experience and an individual approach - a guarantee of quality repairs at a reasonable price
HomePage.4thP: We work quickly and with care for the client

WhyUsPage.title: Why choose us?
WhyUsPage.1stP: Warranty on all repairs - Quality you can rely on
WhyUsPage.2ndP: Only tested spare parts - no fakes
WhyUsPage.5thP: Online request and repair status tracking
